p: The phylogenetic analysis for KBV showed that the sister group of most New Zealand KBV sequences was a group from Tasmania (pp = 0.641, Figure 3 and Figure S3, non-dated phylogeny). KBV from a New Zealand V. vulgaris, however, closely matched samples from the USA (HM228885, HM228887) (pp = 1, Figure 3 and Figure S3, non-dated phylogeny).
